extension.description: Finds functions by @category in the active file.
command.title: Search @category

view.title: Category Finder
command.focus.title: Focus on Category Finder View
settings.backgroundColor.description: Custom background color for the panel. If left empty, it uses the VS Code theme color.
settings.inputBackgroundColor.descriptio: Custom background color for input fields. If left empty, it uses the VS Code theme color.
settings.showCommented.description: Show commented functions in a different color, otherwise they are hidden.
settings.showExtendedNames.description: If true, shows function names with their full hierarchy (e.g., Class.function).
settings.showFileSelector.description: If true, allows choosing to display functions from a specific open file, otherwise only from the current one.
